Lyric:
[by:初级说唱翻译]
[00:34.93]Hold on, hold on, fuck that. Fuck that shit. 
[00:43.04]Hold on, I got to start this mothafuckin' record over again, wait a minute. 
[00:47.12]Fuck that shit. Still on this mothafuckin' record. 
[00:50.95]I'ma play this mothafucka for y'all. 
[00:55.65]Ayy, y'all get some more drinks goin' on, I'll sound a whole lot better...
[00:59.28]
[01:15.87]Listen, seeing you got ritualistic
[01:21.68]Cleansin' my soul of addiction for now
[01:26.23]'Cause I'm fallin' apart, yeah
[01:32.82]Tension between us just like picket fences
[01:39.80]You got issues that I won't mention for now
[01:43.06]'Cause we're fallin' apart
[01:45.83]
[01:50.10]Passionate from miles away
[01:52.39]Passive with the things you say
[01:56.27]Passin' up on my old ways
[01:59.10]I can't blame you now, now
[02:06.38]Passionate from miles away
[02:10.30]Passive with the things you say
[02:13.82]Passin' up on my old ways
[02:16.06]I can't blame you now, now
[02:21.92]
[02:41.28]Listen, hard at buildin' trust from a distance
[02:47.74]I think we should rule out commitment for now
[02:51.78]'Cause we're fallin' apart
[02:58.50]Leavin', you're just doing that to get even
[03:04.83]Don't pick up the pieces, just leave it for now
[03:08.88]They keep fallin' apart
[03:12.24]
[03:15.63]Passionate from miles away
[03:18.87]Passive with the things you say
[03:22.13]Passin' up on my old ways
[03:25.80]I can't blame you now, now
[03:32.97]Passionate from miles away
[03:36.28]Passive with the things you say
[03:39.25]Passin' up on my old ways
[03:42.60]I can't blame you now, now
[04:11.40]Trying to think of the right thing to say�
